section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on February 22, 2026.*
section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This this subchapter may be cited as the "Interactive Wayfinding Kiosk Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025".
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 2-1228.01, see § 2211 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2211 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
